mapper.select: select userName,substr(to_char(reportingDate,'yyyy"년"MM"월"dd"일"'),1,8)as formedreportingdate,sum(income)as income,sum(expense)as expense from account_book where id=#{id} group by userName,substr(to_char(reportingDate,'yyyy"년"MM"월"dd"일"'),1,8) order by formedreportingdate desc
select * from account_book where id=#{id} and substr(to_char(reportingDate,'yyyy"년"MM"월"dd"일"'),1,8) = #{formedDate} order by reportingdate desc
mapper.update: update account_book set reportingDate=#{reportingDate},details=#{details},payments=#{payments},spec=#{spec},income=#{income},expense=#{expense},remarks=#{remarks} where seq=#{seq} and id=#{id} and username=#{userName}
